languages.text: "...черпайте силы свои в непоколебимой вере и обретайте мужество в исполнении последнего долга, ибо слабость перед врагами Его есть ересь..."

traits.locale_text: "...черпайте силы свои в непоколебимой вере и обретайте мужество в исполнении последнего долга, ибо слабость перед врагами Его есть ересь..."

languages.text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."
languages.original_text: "...черпайте силы свои в непоколебимой вере и обретайте мужество в исполнении последнего долга, ибо слабость перед врагами Его есть ересь..."

traits.locale_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."
"...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."
"...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."
"...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."
"...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

languages.text: “……要从坚定的信仰中汲取力量，要从你们最后的职责中找到勇气，因为只有异端分子才会在神皇的敌人面前暴露弱点……”
languages.original_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

traits.locale_text: “……要从坚定的信仰中汲取力量，要从你们最后的职责中找到勇气，因为只有异端分子才会在神皇的敌人面前暴露弱点……”

languages.text: «... que vuestra fe inquebrantable os proporcione fuerzas y que vuestro deber final os otorgue coraje, pues mostrar debilidad frente a Sus enemigos es herejía...».
languages.original_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

traits.locale_text: «... que vuestra fe inquebrantable os proporcione fuerzas y que vuestro deber final os otorgue coraje, pues mostrar debilidad frente a Sus enemigos es herejía...».

languages.text: 「…揺るぎない信仰から強さを引き出し、最後の義務を果たす勇気を見出すのだ。弱さを敵の前に示すことは異端である…」
languages.original_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

traits.locale_text: 「…揺るぎない信仰から強さを引き出し、最後の義務を果たす勇気を見出すのだ。弱さを敵の前に示すことは異端であるからだ…」
「…揺るぎない信仰から強さを引き出し、最後の義務を果たす勇気を見出すのだ。弱さを敵の前に示すことは異端である…」

languages.text: « ... puisez la force dans votre foi inflexible et trouvez le courage d'accomplir votre ultime devoir, car faire preuve de faiblesse face à Ses ennemis est une hérésie... »
languages.original_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

traits.locale_text: « ... puisez la force dans votre foi inflexible et trouvez le courage d'accomplir votre ultime devoir, car faire preuve de faiblesse face à Ses ennemis est une hérésie... »

languages.text: "... erhaltet Kraft aus Eurem unerschütterlichen Glauben, und findet Mut in der Erfüllung Eurer letzten Pflicht, denn vor Seinen Feinden Schwäche zu zeigen, ist Ketzerei ..."
languages.original_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

traits.locale_text: "... erhaltet Kraft aus Eurem unerschütterlichen Glauben, und findet Mut in der Erfüllung Eurer letzten Pflicht, denn vor Seinen Feinden Schwäche zu zeigen, ist Ketzerei ..."

languages.text: "Sarsılmaz inancınızdan güç alın ve bu güçle nihai vazifeniz için cesaret bulun. Unutmayın ki O'nun düşmanlarının önünde zayıflık göstermek kâfirliktir."
languages.original_text: "...draw strength from your unwavering faith and find courage in fulfilling your final duty, for showing weakness before His enemies is heresy..."

traits.locale_text: "...Sarsılmaz inancınızdan güç alın ve bu güçle nihai vazifeniz için cesaret bulun. Unutmayın ki O'nun düşmanlarının önünde zayıflık göstermek kâfirliktir."
